    Stripped down version of the Model.NeuralNetwork.Neuron class, represents a neuron with static input of one.

      • process

        public void process(Jama.Matrix input)
        The bias neuron has a static input of one. This method ignores all other passed input and sets the bias neurons input statically.
        Overrides:
        process in class Model.NeuralNetwork.Neuron
        Parameters:
        input - the neurons input Matrix (no effect)

        public void adjustSynapseWeights(Jama.Matrix weightDelta)
        Description copied from class: Model.NeuralNetwork.Neuron
        Adjusts neurons weight matrix by a given delta. Used in the back-propagation algorithm
        Overrides:
        adjustSynapseWeights in class Model.NeuralNetwork.Neuron
